name: Louise's Vacation
description:
Louise has finally made it to Gensokyo for a vacation, but she doesn't know where to go! Luckily, Sumireko's here to help! Play as Louise and Sumireko as you explore the Youkai Mountain in search for treasure!

Made for Touhou Game Jam 2021 organised by Garakuta

Controls: 

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Z Key: Talk
  • X Key: Use Character Abilities
  • C Key: Change Characters
  • Esc Key: Pause
  • F11: Full Screen

Credits:

  • EasternMouse: Programming, Level Design (Twitter)
  • Megapig9001: Directing, Writing, Translation, Level Design (Youtube) (Twitter)
  • captaindiz: Graphics (itch.io)
  • Sketchably: Graphics (itch.io) (Instagram)
  • Prismriver Orchestra: Music (Youtube)
  • Wookywok: Music, Writing, Level Design (Youtube)

* Original jam version is included as gamein original state it was uploaded to jam site

*Jam Stable version has no additional content over Original Jam version but have non-critical bugs fixed (BGM stucking and dialogue after using reset button)
